dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing nearly 8,000 real household objects from 98 categories with their corresponding natural language descriptions, allowing for the generation of multi-view images.
dcterms:title: ABO (Amazon-Berkeley Objects)

dcterms:creator: K. Chen

dcterms:description: A dataset that allows for generating shapes from natural language by learning joint embeddings, primarily focused on text-to-shape generation.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet
